Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.viewables.LeaderCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Viewable
public class LeaderCard extends Object implements Viewable
This class creates the viewable of the leader card used in LeaderCardSpace of the player

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(int[] update)
      Updates the viewable using numbers from the getStatus
      Specified by:
      update in interface Viewable
      Parameters:
      update - array composed by the id of the leader card (used to update the requirements), other 4 int to define the state (inactive/active/discarded), fixed input, fixed output, mutable output, and other 10 int to define the current supply and the depot ability (if the id is 0 the card is empty)

    • abilityIndex

      private int abilityIndex​(int[] array)
      Helper method that, given an array, returns the index of the element that is not zero (used to understand what WarehouseObjectType is content by the Depot of the leader card that has Depot ability)
      Parameters:
      array - array composed by 4 int (arrayDepots)
      Returns:
      the int corresponding to the resource (contained in the Depot of the leader)
